content: corner-to-corner blankie is not only perfect for beginners but is perfect for anyone looking to whip up a gift fast knit with bulky yarn and large needles you can make a snuggly blanket just in time for a little one s arrival or as a cozy way to stay warm when the cold weather sneaks up on you want a bigger blankie just use more skeins use 2 for a crib size or 4 for a lap blankie
